short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show today's work time and income
short.zh_CN: 显示今日工作时间和收入情况

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension helps you track your daily work progress and estimated income in a fun and engaging way. By setting your work hours and hourly wage, you can view a countdown timer and live income updates in the bottom right corner of your browser. Ideal for freelancers and remote workers, this tool brings motivation to your workday while adding a touch of creativity with animated visual elements.
long.zh_CN: 这款 Chrome 插件帮助您以有趣和直观的方式追踪每日工作进度和预计收入。通过设置工作时间和时薪，您可以在浏览器右下角查看倒计时和实时收入更新。
